item.title: Twenty-three theses on Elon Musk and Twitter
item.description:
Elon Musk‚Äôs purchase of Twitter is a Black Hole of Discourse that has engulfed the entire media, and I‚Äôm no exception. It touches on so many things ‚Äî climate, space travel, economics, media ‚Äî that I couldn‚Äôt really work my thoughts into a coherent whole. But it‚Äôs my blog and I can be incoherent if I want, so here are some thoughts in scattered epigrammatic style‚Ä¶

URL: https://www.slowboring.com/p/twenty-three-theses-on-elon-musk?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: Still on Team ‚ÄúThe Fed Has Got This‚Äù, &

item.title: Kelsey Piper
item.description:
Kelsey Piper on Twitter

‚ÄúThe top-line result of this study of microlending is that it helps women start businesses and earn income. But unfortunately, the businesses they are starting are often multilevel marketing businesses, where you mostly make money by signing up other people. (1/7) https://t.co/s8P55x5mmR‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/KelseyTuoc/status/1503802220084555776

item.description:
Nathan Taylor on Twitter

‚Äú‚Äúsupport for the French Gaullists and the socialists collapsed from 54% in the late Eighties to just 6% today. Over the last half century, the French socialists ‚Äî once the pre-eminent Left-wing party in Europe ‚Äî have fallen from over 40% to just 1.7%.‚Äù https://t.co/XY77TwRAdw‚Äù

item.title: Richard Ngo
item.description:
Richard Ngo on Twitter

‚ÄúI grew up in New Zealand hearing horror stories about the over-medication of American kids. So it took me decades to realise I had ADHD, even though I had all the symptoms and struggled to work for more than a few minutes straight. Turns out Adderall is an absolute lifesaver.‚Äù

‚ÄúI know Dall-E is impressive but I am absolutely floored by Google‚Äôs PaLM correctly identifying a deadpan joke as an ‚Äúanti-joke‚Äù and explaining it (last example in photo) https://t.co/2qjfnmyRkk Progress towards the singularity has never been more visible.‚Äù
